bilingual.source: Do you know what a resolution is?
The first resolution is about my own personal improvement.
bilingual.target: 第一个决心是关于我个人的提升。

bilingual.source: The second resolution is about improving my physical health.
bilingual.target: 第二个决心是改善我的身体健康。

bilingual.source: Do you think the best resolution is to have no resolutions? Why or why not?
bilingual.target: 你认为最好的决心是不下决心吗？为什么？

bilingual.source: The last resolution is about how to do better at school.
bilingual.target: 最后一个决心是如何在学校表现得更好。

bilingual.source: The third resolution is about improving my relationships with my family and friends.
bilingual.target: 第三个决心是改善我与家人和朋友的关系。

bilingual.source: His resolution to quit smoking was admirable.
bilingual.target: 他戒烟的决心令人钦佩。

bilingual.source: She made a resolution to exercise more regularly.
bilingual.target: 她下定决心要更规律地锻炼。

bilingual.source: Despite the challenges, he maintained his resolution.
bilingual.target: 尽管面临挑战，他依然保持了他的决心。

bilingual.source: With great resolution, he tackled the difficult project.
bilingual.target: 他以极大的决心处理这个困难的项目。

yingyinNormal.en: I just want a peaceful resolution. As do I.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只想寻求和平解决方案。我也是。

yingyinNormal.en: You're letting go of the resolution? Eyes? Perfect.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要撤回提案吗？眼妆呢？堪称完美。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. The United States voted against this resolution.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，美国投了反对票。

yingyinNormal.en: I just want to make sure we find a manageable resolution to this oil…
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只想确保我们找到可行方案解决这场油价……

yingyinNormal.en: Hey Rach, maybe your resolution should be to gossip less. What? I don't gossip.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许你应该让自己别那么八卦。我哪有八卦。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, my New Year's resolution is to learn how to play the guitar. Really? How come?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的新年新希望是学吉他。真的？为什么？

yingyinNormal.en: What are you doing, what are you doing? It's my New Year's resolution. To blind my child?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在干什么？这是我的新年新希望。把我儿子弄瞎？

yingyinNormal.en: Easy? You have never kept a resolution. Yes, I have. Okay, let's see how you did last year.
yingyinNormal.zh: 简单？你从来没做到过。我当然有。好，来看看你去年的表现。

yingyinNormal.en: Come back to the table. Engage us in good faith. Or the resolution goes to a vote next week.
yingyinNormal.zh: 重新回到谈判桌上来，与我们真诚谈判，否则下周提案就将进入表决环节。

yingyinNormal.en: My resolution is to be less obsessed with being neat and clean. Really? No. Or something else.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我希望自己不要那么洁癖。是吗？不要，换一个好了。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you. Thank you. We will now vote on the resolution. Ladies and gentlemen, please cast your vote.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢各位。谢谢，现在就方案进行表决，女士们，先生们，请投票。

yingyinNormal.en: Dear diary: I'm so excited. My resolution is to write in you every day. I'll see you tomorrow. Nothing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的日记：我好兴奋，我的新年新希望是每天写你，我们明天见。什么都没写。

yingyinNormal.en: Everyday I am gonna do one thing that I haven't done before. That my friends is my New Year's resolution.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我每天都要做一件没做过的事，这就是我的新年新希望。

yingyinNormal.en: What? They were like this. Alright, okay. Fine, my New Year's resolution will be not to gossip. It's easy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她隆成这样耶，好，我的新年新希望、就是不八卦，这还不简单。

yingyinNormal.en: The ambassador is working hard to push the peacekeeping resolution to a vote by the General Assembly. Why the delay?
yingyinNormal.zh: 大使在努力推动联合国大会就维和提案投票 。为什么延迟了？

yingyinNormal.en: The country needs clarity and resolution. That's the most important thing. There'll be another election in four y ears.
yingyinNormal.zh: 国家需要透明和决议。那是最重要的事。四年后还会有选举。

yingyinNormal.en: We think Israel's behind it. They got cold feet, convinced the African bloc to sabotage the resolution so they have an out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们认为是以色列搞的鬼，他们临阵怯场，便让非洲集团破坏提案进程，他们好下台。

yingyinNormal.en: That's good one too, Pheebs. Now all you have to do is find a planeload of people who's resolution is to plummet to their deaths.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个也很棒，接着你得找一群希望自己坠机身亡的人。

yingyinNormal.en: No. To take more pictures of all of us together. I mean I really think it's the best resolution because everyone can enjoy the pictures.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，是多照照我们的相片，我觉得这样最好，大家都会喜欢。

yingyinNormal.en: What is your take on UN Resolution 9214, the imposition of sanctions on the Congo for the illegal mining and smuggling of mineral resources.
yingyinNormal.zh: 您对联合国9214号决议强行赦免刚果境内非法采煤以及走私煤矿行为的看法。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_usage.usage:
resolution，determination，resolve都有“决定，决心”之意，区别在于：
resolution指自觉地正式表示的决心，含极强的主观能动意味，如new year's resolution。
determination侧重坚定不移的顽强意志力。
resolve语气较强，强调个人下决心干具体的一件事。

make a resolution to do sth.表示“下定决心做某事”，如：
He made a resolution to study hard.
他下定决心要努力学习。
resolution against/for sth.表示“反对/赞成……的决议”，如：“resolution against nuclear weapons 反对核武器的决议”。
resolution on sth.表示“关于……的决议”，如：“a resolution on independence 关于独立的决议”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the action of solving a problem, dispute, or contentious matter

examination_example.sentence: Many public health policymakers believe that the <highlight>resolution</highlight> of age-associated disease will tell us something fundamental about the ageing process.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公共卫生政策制定者认为，年龄相关疾病的解决将能告诉我们老龄化过程的一些基本情况。

examination_example.sentence: The idea that the <highlight>resolution</highlight> of age-associated diseases will inform us about ageing is not based on sound science or logic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 解决与年龄相关的疾病会让我们了解衰老，这种想法并不是基于可靠的科学或逻辑。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>resolution</highlight> of age-related diseases will solve the mystery of ageing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 解决与年龄有关的疾病将解开衰老之谜。

examination_example.sentence: Ego aside, a third advantage is that the emotional neutrality of indifferent relationships has been found to strengthen one's focus on task <highlight>resolution</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 抛开自我不谈，“冷漠关系”的第三个好处是这一关系中的情感中立可以提高一个人在解决问题上的注意力。

sense_info_list.en: the quality of being determined or resolute

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 决心; 决定; 决议
坚决; 果断; 解决

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 决心; 决定; 决议

examination_example.sentence: Moreover, the older you are, the more likely you will come to a <highlight>resolution</highlight> after an argument.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且，年龄越大，越有可能在争吵后达成和解。

examination_example.sentence: Why is it that "the older you are, the more likely you will come to a <highlight>resolution</highlight> after an argument"?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么说“年龄越大，争吵后达成决议的可能性越大”？

sense_info_list.zh: 坚决; 果断; 解决

examination_example.sentence: This means that resolving an argument can feel like you have reached a state of <highlight>resolution</highlight>—and you are less likely to be annoyed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这意味着化解一场争论会让你觉得你已经达到了解决的状态——而且你不太可能生气。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Although there are differences, most <highlight>resolutions</highlight> have one thing in common.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然有差异，但大多数决心都有一个共同点。

examination_example.sentence: Many <highlight>resolutions</highlight> have to do with self-improvement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很多决心都与自我提升有关。

examination_example.sentence: The first <highlight>resolution</highlight> is about my own personal improvement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第一个决定是关于我个人的提升。

examination_example.sentence: The clearest pictures were taken by the medium-<highlight>resolution</highlight> camera.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最清晰的照片是由中分辨率相机拍摄的。

examination_example.sentence: The medium-<highlight>resolution</highlight> camera, can only produce lesser clear pictures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中等分辨率的相机，只能产生不太清晰的画面。

examination_example.sentence: When were the first high-<highlight>resolution</highlight> photos of Mars made public by CNSA?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第一张火星的高分辨率照片是什么时候由CNSA公之于众的？
